item.title: 704 source item price settings
item.dc:creator: @Deus1993 Deus1993
item.description:
@Deus1993 wrote:

case 1050: case 11726: case 11728: item.getDefinitions().setValue(95000000); break; }

Sets the price to 95M for item 1050, 11720, and 11728.

To set different prices for each do this

case 1050: item.getDefinitions().setValue(95000000); break; case 11726: item.getDefinitions().setValue(10); break; case 11728: item.getDefinitions().setValue(15); break; }

That sets 1050 to 95M, 11726 to 10, and 11728 to 15.

Read full topic

item.title: 704 source item price settings
item.dc:creator: @zingerman111 zingerman111
item.description:
@zingerman111 wrote:

how am i suppose to edit the prices for items because this is what i did

[code]public int getBuyPrice(Item item, int dq) {
switch (item.getId()) {
case 1050:
case 11726:
case 11728:
item.getDefinitions().setValue(95000000);
break;
}
return item.getDefinitions().getValue();
}

public int getSellPrice(Item item, int dq) {
	switch (item.getId()) {
	case 1050:
	case 11726:
	case 11728:
		item.getDefinitions().setValue(95000000);
		break;
	}
	return item.getDefinitions().getValue() / 2;
}[/code]

but this only lets me set the price to 95M to the certain cases i put there i wanted to make more prices for items i copied the code again to put different item ids in but i get error then so how do i do this ?

Read full topic
